DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety toleration PF-03049423 follow multiple dose administration oral solution healthy young adult volunteer healthy elderly volunteer . The study also evaluate pharmacokinetics PF-03049423 multiple dose administration healthy young adult volunteer healthy elderly volunteer . The study also explore relationship blood pressure ( supine standing ) PF-03049423 concentration .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Safety And Tolerability Of Different Doses Of PF-03049423 In Healthy Adult Volunteers And Healthy Older Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose investigation evaluate safety tolerability investigational new drug , PF-03049423 , dose two week healthy young healthy old subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy person , male female . For healthy young adult cohort , subject must 18 50 year old , inclusive . For healthy elderly adult cohort , subject must 51 99 year old , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 35 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) Subjects clinically significant medical condition . Women nonchild bear potential . Subjects know medical history hearing loss/disability nonarteritic ischemic optic neuropathy . A positive urine drug screen .
